content: Itamar is a senior economist at the Bank of Israel’s Research Department and where he serves as the Head of the Monetary Analysis Unit. He also teaches ‚ÄúMachine Learning of Economists‚Äù at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem. In the past, Itamar was a Central Bank Research Fellow at the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) and held an economist position at the research department of the Israeli Ministry of Finance.
